name: ListBookingCustomAttributes
description:
Retrieve a booking's custom attributes.

Use this tool to list custom attributes associated with a specific booking. Ensure proper OAuth scope with 'APPOINTMENTS_READ' for buyer-level permissions or both 'APPOINTMENTS_ALL_READ' and 'APPOINTMENTS_READ' for seller-level permissions.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the target booking to list custom attributes for. This is required to specify which booking's attributes to retrieve.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in a single response (1-100). Default is 20.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single paged response. This limit is advisory.
The response might contain more or fewer results. The minimum value is 1 and the maximum value is 100.
The default value is 20. For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor from the previous API response used to retrieve the next page of results.

value_schema.description:
The cursor returned in the paged response from the previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next page of results for your original request. For more
information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: include_custom_attribute_definitions
parameters.description: Set to true to include custom attribute definitions, providing names, descriptions, data types, and other details. Default is false.

value_schema.description:
Indicates whether to return the [custom attribute definition](entity:CustomAttributeDefinition) in the `definition` field of each
custom attribute. Set this parameter to `true` to get the name and description of each custom
attribute, information about the data type, or other definition details. The default value is `false`.
